string-array.name: ruleList
string-array.item: FastTapper is a simple competitive game, in which two people play against each other.
When the indicator changes from Ready...Set... to Tap, the one who presses first wins.
If you press when Tap is not highlighted, you lose a point.
The one to reach the desired set no. of points you win.
It can be a fun and competitive party game. Play Honest :) and Enjoy :)
